settings.title: The Spot
settings.text: We believe understanding your cycle is a powerful form of self-care. Through frank discussion and education, we make periods, hormones, sex and women’s health table talk.

settings.title: Welcome to Modular
settings.text: A unique layout with a striking design

settings.title: Welcome to Modular
settings.text: A unique layout with a striking design

settings.title: Period Cups: Need to Know
settings.content: When the word "Period Cup" gets dropped into conversation, it's often followed with a stream of questions and curiosity around how it works and what the fuss is all about.

settings.title:
We are Scarlet and
we're proud to bleed
Introducing a fresh take on period care. Smart, sustainable products and straight-up, honest  conversations - so you can be clued up and in control of your body. We call it no fear period gear.
Only the good stuff
settings.description: We care about what you put in your vagina and believe the products you use during your cycle should help support your overall health, performance and wellbeing. That's why we create smart, intuitive and sustainable products - led by design and informed by insights. So you can do you, worry free.

settings.title: A more conscious cycle
settings.description: We’re cruelty-free, paraben-free and 100% vegan. From products to packaging, we are committed to making mindful and sustainable choices which are good for your body and have big payoffs for the environment.

settings.title: Know yourself
settings.description: We believe that understanding your cycle is the most powerful form of self care, so we go there. We’re here to make periods, hormones, sex and women’s health - table talk. Because, they really should be. We hope that through frank discussion and education, we can harness the power of our cycles - changing the game for people with periods everywhere.

settings.title: What we stand for
settings.description: As a devoted member of 1% for the Planet, Scarlet joins a global community of conscious brands and individuals committed to giving back. By donating 1% of their annual sales, they support initiatives addressing pressing environmental issues, such as climate change, deforestation, and ocean pollution. With Scarlet, you can make a difference while embracing sustainable style.

settings.title: How long will it take to receive my order?
settings.answer: Our team works hard to ensure orders are shipped as soon as possible via Australia Post. In most cases, delivery takes 3-5 business days in metro areas and 5-7 business days in regional areas. However, please note that unforeseen disruptions beyond our control may occasionally occur. If you experience any delays, don't hesitate to reach out to us. We're here to assist you.

settings.title: What are your shipping rates?
settings.answer: We offer two shipping options: Standard and Express. The standard shipping fee is $7.95, or free for orders over $65. Express shipping costs $12, or FREE for orders over $100.

settings.title: Do you have express shipping?
settings.answer: Yup, Express shipping is $12, or free for orders over $100!

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.answer: Absolutely! We offer shipping to most countries, and the best part is that all orders over $120 are eligible for free shipping. Otherwise, a flat rate of $30 (AUD) applies.

settings.title: Can I change shipping address?
settings.answer: No worries, just send us an email at support@scarletperiod.com and we’ll assist.

settings.title: I didn't receive an order confirmation?
settings.answer: You should receive an order confirmation to the email you entered at checkout. If not, let us know via support@scarletperiod.com and we’ll make sure it’s in progress.

settings.title: WHAT IS YOUR 30-DAY RISK-FREE TRIAL TERMS?
settings.answer:
We understand that exploring a new way to manage your period can take some time to adjust. That's why we offer a 30-Day Risk-Free Trial to support you in finding the perfect solution. As a first-time or new customer, if you are unsatisfied with one used product from your initial order with Scarlet, you can make a claim as part of our 30-Day Risk-Free Trial. You are not required to return the product you are claiming.

To claim your 30-Day Risk-Free Trial, please email us at support@scarletperiod.com. You will be refunded or credited for the price you paid for 1 (one) item. Please note that shipping costs are not eligible for credit or refund, and changes of mind are not applicable.

Please be aware that certain items are excluded from our 30-Day Risk-Free Trial, including wash and body products, as well as accessories such as laundry bags, travel bags, or gifts with purchase

settings.title: How do I update my shipping and/or billing address?
settings.answer: To update your personal details, you have two options. You can either log in to your account and make the changes through the icon located at the top of the home page, or you can simply email us at support@scarletperiod.com, and our team will be happy to assist you.

settings.title: I cannot login / I forgot my password
settings.answer: If you’re unable to login using the password reset link, pop us an email at support@scarletperiod.com and we’ll help you out.

settings.title: Do you do brand collaborations and can we work together?
settings.answer: Yes, we would love to hear from you! Please send us an email at hello@scarletperiod.com

settings.title: Who can I contact for wholesale opportunities?
settings.answer: If you're interested in stocking Scarlet products, please send us an email: hello@scarletperiod.com

settings.title: THE CHECKOUT ISN'T WORKING?
settings.answer: Email us at support@scarletperiod.com so we can help you out asap.

settings.title: What payment methods do you accept?
settings.answer: We accept various payment methods, including Visa, Mastercard, American Express, PayPal, Afterpay, Apple Pay, and Shop Pay. Simply choose your preferred payment option during checkout and enter your details as prompted.

settings.title: Get in touch
settings.answer:
General enquiries

hello@scarletperiod.com


Press enquiries:

hello@scarletperiod.com


Returns and customer care:

support@scarletperiod.com

settings.title: WHY BUY A MULTIPACK?
settings.answer: To save your hard-earned coin! The average period lasts anywhere between 3-8 days, so let's be real, you’ll want a few pairs to manage your cycle. We've made it simpler for you to save money on the most comfortable period underwear available in styles that you'll adore.

settings.title: HOW DOES THE UNDERWEAR ACTUALLY WORK?
settings.answer:
All our absorbent period underwear features integrated leakproof technology for ultimate protection.

Layer 1: This layer is designed to wick moisture away from your skin, keeping you feeling dry and comfortable.
Layer 2: Our most absorbent pair can hold up to 8 tampons worth of blood, securely locking it in place.
Layer 3: The front to rear leakproof fabrics ensure that you stay dry, and nothing leaks through to the other side.
Layer 4: The breathable outer layer keeps everything discreet.

settings.title: DO I NEED TO WEAR A PAD OR TAMPON WITH PERIOD UNDERWEAR?
settings.answer: The short answer: nope! With Scarlet period undies, you have options. Depending on the absorbency level and the heaviness of your flow, you can choose to wear them on their own for reliable protection or as a backup to tampons or our menstrual cup. It's up to you and your personal preferences.

settings.title: HOW DO I WASH YOUR UNDERWEAR?
settings.answer: Washing your Scarlet period underwear is a breeze! Simply toss them in with the rest of your laundry on a cold wash cycle (don't worry, your other clothes will be just fine!). If you prefer, you can give them a quick rinse beforehand. For drying, you have two options: tumble dry on low or hang them out to dry in the sun. That's it!

settings.title: HOW MUCH MONEY WILL I SAVE?
settings.answer: On average, using tampons and pads can cost you around $240 per year. With Scarlet, you can spend approximately $120 per year (for five pairs), and they’ll last anywhere from 2 to 10 years depending on proper care. Let's consider a scenario where they last for 5 years—you would only spend $120 compared to $1200 on pads and tampons over the same period. Yikes!

settings.title: CAN I WEAR YOUR UNDERWEAR ALL DAY?
settings.answer:
Yeah! It all depends on the heaviness of your flow on the day, as well as the absorbency level of the underwear.
For example, on days 1 and 2, we typically use a few pairs of moderate and heavy styles per day. However, on days 3 to 6, a single pair of lighter underwear is usually sufficient for the entire day.
If you're new to using period underwear, it's a good idea to try them at home first to understand your flow threshold, which is how long you can comfortably wear one pair before needing to change.

settings.title: WHAT IF I DON'T LOVE THEM RIGHT AWAY?
settings.answer: If you're not satisfied with your purchase or unsure about sizing, don't hesitate to reach out to us. Additionally, we offer a 30-Day Risk-Free Trial guarantee for your peace of mind. If you have any concerns or questions about your order, please email us at support@scarletperiod.com.

settings.title: Comfy meets Cute
settings.subtitle: Everyday period undies that feel like, well, normal undies.

settings.title:
Shop now, pay later
with Afterpay
We’ve Got You Covered
settings.subtitle: Run, jump, dance, sweat, play. Don’t let your period get in your way.

settings.quote_copy: "I recently tried the Scarlet period cup. I’ve always been a tampon girl but wanted to try something that was better for the environment. I’m 100% converted!"
settings.label: Alanna

settings.quote_copy: "Seriously love these so much. The g-string is AMAZING, I’ve been looking for a period undie g-string for the longest time now. They both don’t feel bulky or uncomfortable, or like I’m wearing a massive diaper like some others have. I forgot they were period undies to be honest!"
settings.label: Keely

settings.quote_copy: "I’ve got my whole period cycle covered with scarlet undies. And extra just in case."
settings.label: Sherina C

settings.text_newsletter: Notify me when this product is available:

settings.title: Sign up for discounts and freebies!

settings.text: Plus, be the first to hear about product launches, tips & tricks and juicy sales.
settings.thankyou_text:
We'll only send you the good stuff.

We Promise.

settings.title: It’s Getting Hot Out
settings.html:
We don’t think you should skip that beach trip or pool party, just because you’re bleeding.

Try our leak-proof period swimwear - designed to look and feel like, well, regular swimwear. No sand in your vagina, either.

settings.title: Cute Undies for Everyone
settings.html: We get it — sizing for bottoms is anything but standardised. Which is why our undies guide helps break it down for you. For extra ass-urance, whip out your trusty measuring tape. (Most likely stashed at the bottom of your junk drawer.)
